testcase.name: Set Schedule for Hold Payment
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Real Time Disbursement"..............................passed And Select Menu "Hold Payment Configuration"................................passed And Input "Start Date Hold Payment" with value "25-01-2021".................passed And Input "Release Date" with value "30-01-2021"............................passed And Click button "Add"......................................................passed And Get text from pop up "Confirm" with text "Add new hold payment config?".passed And Click button "Yes"......................................................passed And Verify Result...........................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
